Package tz.co.vodacom.bujikun.util

Class AppUtility

java.lang.Object
tz.co.vodacom.bujikun.util.AppUtility
public class AppUtility extends Object
Groups methods for general application manipulation like displaying content and user navigation
Since:
2023
Author:
Newton Bujiku

    • readUserChoice

      public static String readUserChoice(String message, String terminator, boolean isMainMenu)
      Reads input from the user and make proper decision. This will act upon either sub menu of file operations or main menu
      Parameters:
      message - Message prompt directing the user what to do
      terminator - Input that will terminate the loop
      isMainMenu - Application will react differently depending on where this method is invoked
      Returns:
      User entered choice that will be acted upon
      Since:
      2023

    • readUserChoice

      public static String readUserChoice(String message)
      Overloaded to read user input without listening for a loop termination character
      Parameters:
      message - Prompt to the user
      Returns:
      User entered choice
      Since:
      2023
